name: browser
description: Headless browser automation â€” open pages, interact, screenshot. Auto-detects MetaPower (antidetect) or falls back to Puppeteer.
author: meta

tools.name: browser_open
tools.description: Open a URL and get the page content as text, or take a screenshot/PDF. Use for pages that require JavaScript rendering or when fetch doesn't work.

tools.name: browser_act
tools.description: Run automation steps on the current page (click, type, scroll, wait, etc). Steps are a JSON array.

url.description: URL to open first (optional if page already open)

tools.name: browser_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of a URL or current page. Returns the file path.

fullpage.description: true for full page screenshot (default: false)

instructions: You have browser automation available. Use browser_open for reading JS-rendered pages. Use browser_act for multi-step interactions (login, form fill, navigation). Use browser_screenshot for visual capture. Prefer fetch for simple pages that don't need JS.
